term.title: harpoon mechanism

item.text: Reaction sequence (thermal or photoinduced) between neutral molecular or atomic entities in which long-range electron transfer is followed by a considerable reduction of the distance between donor and acceptor sites as a result of the electrostatic attraction in the ion pair created.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2245 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
